title: Amazon DynamoDB to Amazon OpenSearch Service Serverless with Zero-ETL
description: Create a zero-ETL integration from Amazon DynamoDB to Amazon OpenSearch Serverless.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project shows how to deploy a zero-ETL integration from a DynamoDB table to an OpenSearch Serverless collection.
